level.heading: DELAYED REGISTRATION OF BIRTH[COLON] ABSTRACTION OF DOCUMENTARY EVIDENCE (ยง9-2806)

level.text: The Registrar shall abstract on the delayed certificate of birth a description of each document submitted to support the facts shown on the delayed birth certificate, which shall include the following:
The title or description of the document;

The name and address of the affiant if the document is an affidavit of personal knowledge, or of the custodian if the document is an original or certified copy of a record or a signed statement from the custodian;
The date of the original filing of the document being abstracted;
The information regarding the birth facts contained in the document.
Each document submitted in support of the delayed birth registration shall be returned to the applicant after review and abstraction.
